Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GRANCOLOMBIA_MAYA_MOD_DESCRIPTION]Contains two new civilizations and leaders, six new city-states, two new resources, three new naturals wonders, additional disasters, and the Apocalypse game mode.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GRANCOLOMBIA_MAYA_MOD_TEASER]New Civilizations and Leaders - Lady Six Sky of the Maya and Simón Bolívar of Gran Colombia
